com.sysgears.calculatorserver.userInterface
Enum EServerModeMessages

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<EServerModeMessages>
      com.sysgears.calculatorserver.userInterface.EMessages
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<EServerModeMessages>
public enum EServerModeMessages
extends java.lang.Enum<EServerModeMessages>

This enumeration contains all messages that the interface sends to users in server mode.
